description: Map bronze executions to canonical entity model with referential integrity checks
sql_template: SELECT e.execution_id, e.order_id, e.product_id, e.venue_mic, e.quantity, e.trade_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS trade_timestamp, o.trader_id, p.asset_class FROM bronze_execution e JOIN bronze_order o ON e.order_id = o.order_id JOIN bronze_product p ON e.product_id = p.product_id
